name: John Paul Stevens
office: Associate Justice of the United States Supreme Court
office2: Judge of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the 7th Circuit
spouse: Elizabeth Jane Sheeren  (1942–1979) (divorced) , Maryan Mulholland Simon  (1979–present)
alma_mater: University of Chicago  (B.A.)  ,  Northwestern University School of Law  (J.D.)
awards: Bronze Star, World War II Victory Medal
